context.p: You can generate a list of sections in your topic by using an XSLT script within XSLT-Conref.
The specialized element section-overview is based on the XSLT script xsl:for-each. It itemizes cross references of all sections that have a title and an id attribute.

If sections are created or deleted, the changes are displayed immediately after clicking the refresh button. You do not have to save the file first. If you change the title of an existing section, you must save your changes, close, and reopen the file to update the section overview.
